Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the Registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32;&#32; &#9744; &#160; Item 2.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On January&#160;29, 2019 , Apple&#160;Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221;) issued a press release regarding Apple&#8217;s financial results for its first &#32;fiscal quarter ended December&#160;29, 2018 . A copy of Apple&#8217;s press release is attached hereto as Exhibit&#160;99.1. The information contained in this Current Report shall not be deemed &#8220;filed&#8221; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing. &#160; Item 9.01&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits. Exhibit Number &#160; Exhibit Description &#160; &#160; 99.1 &#160; Press release issued by Apple Inc. on January 29, 2019.
